topic.title: Quiz: Publishing DITA Content
topic.shortdesc: This quiz checks your understanding of publishing processes and translation workflows in DITA.

body.p: 1. What is the main benefit of DITA's multi-channel publishing?

ul.li: a) Create separate content for each output

li.b: c) Write once, publish to many formats

body.p: 2. Which tool is most commonly used for transforming DITA into output formats?
3. How does DITA reduce localization costs?

ul.li: a) All content is excluded from translation
b) It combines languages into one file

li.b: c) Reusable components only need translation once

ul.li: d) It automatically generates all language versions

body.p: 4. What does the translation="no" attribute do?

ul.li: b) Prevents content from being reused

li.b: c) Flags content to skip during translation

body.p: 5. How can PDF output be customized in DITA?

li.b: c) Using XSL-FO or visual tools in editors like Oxygen

ul.li: d) By exporting HTML and printing it
